name: ACI
description: ACI is one of the leading diversified conglomerates in Bangladesh performing businesses in various areas of Pharmaceuticals, Consumer Brands and Commodity

name: Beximco
description: Beximco Pharmaceuticals Ltd (BPL) is a leading manufacturer of pharmaceutical formulations and Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (APIs) in Bangladesh.

name: Square
description: Square Pharmaceuticals Limited, the flagship company of Square Group, is holding the strong leadership position in the pharmaceutical industry of Bangladesh since 1985 and is now on its way to becoming a high performance global player.

name: Chaldal
description: Chaldal.com is an online shop in Dhaka, Bangladesh. We believe time is valuable to our fellow Dhaka residents, and that they should not have to waste hours in traffic, brave bad weather and wait in line just to buy basic necessities like eggs! This is why Chaldal delivers everything you need right at your door-step and at no additional cost.

name: Teer
description: Teer is the most popular brand of City Group. Teer is the first branded mustard oil in Bangladesh. Teer is the most popular brand of City Group. Teer is the first branded mustard oil in Bangladesh.

name: Pran
description: Pran Foods Limited is the largest agribusiness in Bangladesh. It is one of the largest food and beverage brands in Bangladesh and has been exported to 138 countries.
